product_name: Thorlo Experia CoolMax Micro Mini-Crew Socks - Men's
long_description: Powered by Thorlo padding and tailored for performance and minimal bulk, runners will appreciate the lightweight and supportive fit of the Experia Micro Mini-Crew socks. 66% CoolMax(R) polyester content, along with regular polyester, works to wick moisture away from feet to keep them comfortable and dry. Nylon and Lycra(R) spandex work to provide a glovelike fit and supply lightweight support across instep and arch. Sculpted Thorlo pads in the balls and heels provide protection from shear and impact; all but the most essential padding is eliminated to reduce bulk and weight. Lightweight Achilles tendon pad protects against rubbing and chafing, while functioning as a heel lock and adding durability. Flat knit toe seam increases comfort. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Powered by Thorlo padding and tailored for performance and minimal bulk, runners will appreciate the lightweight and supportive fit of the Experia Micro Mini-Crew socks.
